dc_title_s: Map of the canal at the Saut Ste. Mary from a survey by Captain Canfield and Judge Burt; John Holcroft, assistant; drawn by John Holcroft.
dc_description_s: Bathymetry shown by soundings and contours in feet. Shows "proposed canal" and surrounding cultural features. Includes profile. Vertical scale [ca. 1:245]. 1 map; 31 x 45 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Canfield, Augustus, d. 1854.,Burt, William Austin, 1792-1858.,Holcroft, John.,Burger, R. (Robert),R. Burger & Company.
dct_spatial_sm: Sault Sainte Marie, Michigan, United States
